text: I'm excited to share that my paper, 'ToneCheck: Unveiling the Impact of Dialects in Privacy Policy,' was accepted at the ACM Symposium on Access Control Models and Technologies (SACMAT)! Presented at the UTSA School of Data Science in San Antonio, TX, this work showcases systematic approach to human studies, exploring how linguistic tones influence user comprehension and engagement with privacy policies. This research bridges the gap between complex legal language and understanding, fostering more accessible privacy communication.
alt: Jay Giving a Presentation at SACMAT
